name: Brink Media
tag_list: web, mobile, application, development, php, mysql, social, flash
overview: BrinkMedia is a full service marketing agency offering a broad spectrum of custom digital and traditional media services. With a team of web interface designers, programmers, graphic artists, video editors and media buyers, BrinkMedia has a diverse set of experience: from creating mobile applications to sophisticated, full-scale Enterprise marketing campaigns. Their portfolio includes work with well known organizations such as PayPal, the countries of Holland and Monaco, and Kevin Spacey’s film community TriggerStreet, as well as a large array of web services for start-ups and small businesses nationally and internationally.
